subject: Re: Re[junit] commendation to pre-fill databases with data? SQL INSERTs?
msgSnippet: Ben, why doesn t dbUnit help? That s pretty much exactly what it does for you. Are you using JPA? If so you can just use the EntityManager to insert your data

Ben, why doesn't dbUnit help? That's pretty much exactly what it does for
y=
ou.

Are you using JPA? If so you can just use the EntityManager to insert =
your
data

rote:

>
>
>

database access

n these databases.

bases?
>

=
>

> How do I call t=
hese external sql scripts from junit test classes?

d like

it does not help at this step
